short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives Mr Plant's manvsmaths.com a fresh new look and added customizability!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Man Vs UI is an open source chrome extension. I created it to remedy Mr Plant's questionable web design skills and give his website, manvsmaths.com, a new, less gag inducing look.

If you're interested in contributing or just wanna put your own spin on it, you can find the github page here: https://github.com/BitBoyTD/ManVsUI

Created and developed by Se√°n Osborne.
